htmlbody:
Mission and Purpose

The goal of GovTogetherBC is to let citizens know what's being talked about in the province of British Columbia and plug you into ways you can get involved. Whether the government is consulting citizens about taxes, employment standards or healthcare; GovTogetherBC's job is to make sure that you're connected.
